mapper.insert:
insert into tb_order_warehousing (group_uuid, finished_product_model, remark, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, enable, name, serial_num, unit, quantity) VALUES
(#{item.groupUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.finishedProductModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update.foreach:
update tb_order_warehousing
group_uuid = #{record.groupUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finished_product_model = #{record.finishedProductModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
enable = #{record.enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_num = #{record.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id =#{record.id}
